title: HOUR 3- Chris Spielman and Brian Hailine  081720
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Chris Spielman and Brian Hailine  081720
description:
Chris Spielman tells Dan that Big 10 players just want to know why they cant play, Chris says as a parent of and athlete, he would want answers to why his daughter could not compete this season. Brian Hainline says that when he spoke about college athletics not being ready to play; he was talking about at this moment.
